@login Feature: Verify login functionality and select product in the Amazon app 22 Jul 2020 11:53:12 INFO logger - -------------------------------------- 22 Jul 2020 11:53:27 INFO logger - Android driver created
Background: Create an instance of android or ios driver before each scenario # LoginTest.feature:5 Given User has Amazon "android" app # BaseSteps.userHasAmazonApp(String)
Scenario: User should be able to login on app and add product in the list # LoginTest.feature:8 Given taps on "language" image # LoginSteps.tapsOnImage(String) And taps on "signin" button # LoginSteps.tapsOnButton(String) Given user has "valid" username and password # LoginSteps.usernameAndPasswordIs(String) When user enters credentials and submit the button # LoginSteps.userEntersCredentials() Then Search the "65 inch TV" product in the search textbox # LoginSteps.buttonShouldBeVisible(String) And user should be able to scroll and select the product in the search list # LoginSteps.userShouldBeAbleToScroll() org.openqa.selenium.WebDriverException: An unknown server-side error occurred while processing the command.
